column6: File type ending for 10x Genomics counts matrix: 'h5' and 'mtx' involve use of different read functions
Species input for biomaRt feature annotation
FALSE if only RNA-Seq data; TRUE if CITE-Seq and RNA-Seq data generated
FALSE if only RNA-Seq data; TRUE if V(D)J and RNA-Seq data generated
FALSE if only RNA-Seq data; TRUE if ATAC-Seq and RNA-Seq data generated
Memory allocated per sample (minimum 1G required per 1000 cells; set according to sample with highest cell number) (only relevant if using HPC that requires memory allocation request)

column5: Gene Filter - Minimum Percentage Cells Detected:
column6: Percentage of cells (0.1% = 1/1000 cells) in which genes must be detected (>= 3 counts) for use in downstream analyses; *Select "NA" to use all genes as input for clustering and genes with >= 1 count in 1 cell for differential expression*
Gene identifier type when reading h5 files: 'ensembl' for Ensembl gene IDs or 'symbol' for gene symbols
Type of single-cell data object to create: eset' (ExpressionSet), 'seurat' (Seurat), or 'sce' (SingleCellExperiment)
